verses.text: \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H3290"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*. “\w Do|strong="H6680"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* Canaanite \w women|strong="H1323"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H5921"\w* \f + \fr 28:13 \ft Or there beside him\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* saying, “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father Abraham \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w*.
